meanings.definition: A plant of the arum family with arrow-shaped leaves and a spike of red berries.
meanings.sent1: The cuckoopints in the garden have vibrant red berries.
meanings.sent2: I saw cuckoopints growing near the stream.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the cuckoopints.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as green as the cuckoopints in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The cuckoopints added a pop of color to the otherwise dull landscape.

meanings.definition: The tuber of the cuckoopint plant, which is poisonous if ingested.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to confuse cuckoopints with edible tubers.
meanings.sent2: The farmer warned us about the toxicity of cuckoopints.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly used cuckoopints in the stew, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The danger of cuckoopints lurked beneath the soil.
meanings.sent5: The children were taught to avoid picking cuckoopints during their nature walk.
